citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:40 pm on
23-May-19.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 12:40 pm and spoke to the licensee over the phone who stated that she was
not available for the inspection. The inspector then left the facility.
